Tucson had heard everything that Stanton had said to Perceptor.  Even thoug=
h he wished it was never said, he keeps quiet about it, and hopes that perh=
aps things will calm down eventually.  He turns his head in Talon's directi=
on with a smile, grateful for her help.  He gets back on his bench, and lie=
s back.  He sighs, closes his eyes for a moment, and opens them, even thoug=
h he could see nothing but darkness.  He gently holds Talon's hand with a s=
mile.

"Thank you.  It - won't be long until I can actually see you with my=
 own optics.  Question is, can I wait for that period of time? I can feel h=
ow beautiful you are, with my hands, but, it's nothing like being able to s=
ee your beauty for myself.  I can't wait to see what my hands have felt for=
 so long."

He gently embraces her hand.  All the while he hears Legacy sca=
nning over him.

" How long do you suppose re energization will take, Legac=
y?  Just so I know how long to expect being out of commission."
